original_title: Anura Kumara assures diesel subsidy for fishermen under NPP govt
original_body_lines: The Presidential Candidate of the National People’s Power (NPP), Anura Kumara Dissanayake, stated that under an NPP government, fishermen would receive a diesel subsidy, and fishing gear would be exempted from taxes.
He made these remarks during a public rally held in Ambalantota.
